plot outline: Jaganmohini (Jayamalini) commits suicide and becomes a ghost after getting betrayed by a king on the pretext of marriage. Later, the king is reborn as Raja (Narasimha Raju) and is married to a pious woman Gowri (Prabha). Mohini, now a ghost, plans to take away Raja from this world permanently. Can Gowri fight against the magical spells of Mohini and get her husband back?
title: Jaganmohini
plot: _Jaganmohini_ (qv) (Jayamalini) commits suicide and becomes a ghost after getting betrayed by a king on the pretext of marriage. Later, the king is reborn as Raja (Narasimha Raju) and is married to a pious woman Gowri (Prabha). Mohini, now a ghost, plans to take away Raja from this world permanently. Can Gowri fight against the magical spells of Mohini and get her husband back?
